abstract: An identifier for the accessory in a session.
overview:
## Discussion

The value of this property refers to a specific peer accessory. To match [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyObject/distance-676dm] updates your app receives through a session with a peer using [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)], compare the argument object’s discovery token with the value of this property.

Subsequent sessions with the same peer device produce a different value for this property. For user privacy, the system assigns a random number unique to the session that prevents the correlation of this property with a particular device.

# accessoryDiscoveryToken

**Instance Property**

An identifier for the accessory in a session.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var accessoryDiscoveryToken: NIDiscoveryToken { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property refers to a specific peer accessory. To match [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyObject/distance-676dm] updates your app receives through a session with a peer using [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)], compare the argument object’s discovery token with the value of this property.

Subsequent sessions with the same peer device produce a different value for this property. For user privacy, the system assigns a random number unique to the session that prevents the correlation of this property with a particular device.
title: accessoryDiscoveryToken
